description: Application for non-material amendment to planning permission reference 223616FUL dated 23.11.2022 for 'Construction of four buildings, ranging in height from 4 to 6 storeys, to provide studio space for film, television, and entertainment production, offices and workshops. (Use Class E)". Amendment seeks to the layout of the consented substation within the proposed development involving the slight repositioning and modification of the footprint to reflect the M&E and power providers requirements.
decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number (s): 686-CDA-XX-XX-DR-A-00-0105-REV 02- Site Location Plan, G1151-CDA-X-XX-DR-A-90-0110-REV S03- Landscape Plan - Ground Floor Layout, UKP5617 - DWG100 rev 1 - Construction Details, G1151-CDA-X-01-DR-A-90-0210-REV C01 - Substation, NMA Summary Report 20 September 2023, Cover Letter dated 4th October 2023.
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
